description.en: The protagonist, Ye Qiu, was originally an unknown pawn, and inadvertently gained the ability to see through eyes. This ability not only allows him to see through obstacles, but also allows him to see the past through time, and even makes his body more powerful and more agile. With this ability, the protagonist From a low-level employee, Ye Qiu became the top talent of several big antique companies. The protagonist Ye Qiu jumped onto the branch and changed into a phoenix. All the people who had despised, despised, and ridiculed him were beaten in the face.
description.zh: 主角叶秋本是一个无名小卒，无意中获得了透视眼能力，这能力不仅可以让他看透障碍，还可以穿越时间看到过去，甚至可以让自己的身体更加富有力量且更加敏捷，依靠这能力，主角叶秋从一个底层员工一跃成为几大古董公司竞相争强的顶尖人才，主角叶秋从此一跃飞上枝头，变了凤凰，曾经鄙视，蔑视，奚落过他的人全数被打脸。
